name: Delta GNU/Linux
short_description:
Delta GNU/Linux is an Arch based distro, it may offer a little help in learning Arch Linux and/or ease the use of it while maintaining a minimalist aspect.
The LiveCD uses Awesome as a Window Manager and the official theme is already installed.

To enter the live session you just have to type "startx".

The installation follows the same instructions contained on Arch's Wiki.
However, an install script can be found inside the /home/ directory that can help you install a base system.
You can find the repo on:
https://github.com/snakegnt/delta-script

And the theme on:
https://github.com/snakegnt/delta-awesome

As of 22/03/2015 the project will go offline for a while because of lack of time.
Sorry for the inconvenience.

For more information, feel free to contact me at:
<delta.gnulinux@gmail.com>
summary: Live, minimalist GNU/Linux distribution based on Arch Linux.
